amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert clarifying language relating to delinquency of loans made for assistance in connection with a natural or other major disaster.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to insert clarifying language relating to delinquency of loans made for assistance in connection with a natural or other major disaster.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 242 (Roll no. 1071).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Manzullo.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 242 (Roll no. 1071).
